review: This Fire Stick is just what we needed.  We mostly watch Netflix and going through the Blu Ray player was slow and didn't always connect.  So far, we've had no connection problems through the Fire Stick.  We also travel to Florida in the winter so this will be so much easier to take along with us than the Blu Ray player was.  Its easy to use and we have no complaints.
